products.title: Double Roller Horizon Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Blackout, light filtering, cool and private. This horizon grey double roller blind has it all and more, on one simple bracket system. To the front there's the blackout roller blind, a modern shade of grey, so cool and calm. And then to the back there's a soft white sunscreen, fo blackout, light filtering, cool and private.

products.title: Double Roller Charcoal Roller Blind
products.description: We dont believe in compromise, we think your blind should have it all. Which is why this charcoal double roller blind is part of the best collection around. You want something blackout for nighttime shading, but you also need privacy and light during the day. Have them both. Wi we dont believe in compromise, we think your blind should have it all.

products.description: If you love the look of cotswold pebble grey why not take a closer look at their deluxe option? products.title: Crosshatch Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: Crosshatch silver combines a classic geometric pattern with a striking silver that is sure to make a little noise. It's a pattern that seems to reverse depending on the angle of the light, and one which is finished with aplomb by the slightly blueish quality of the silver threads. Combining silver with a dark charcoal is a great way to emphasise the elegance of the shimmer. It's all about giving the threads the platform they need to speak for themselves, so don't be shy about organising your room with this purpose in mind.

products.title: Karma Taupe - Roller Blind
products.description: If you are looking for a dark and moody colour that still adds some light and sparkle to your home, karma taupe could be just what you need. The background glistens and shimmers, making any space feel alive and energetic. And at the same time the matt finish of the trees give it a slightly sombre and tempered feel. A truly thought-provoking contrast. Take your time with taupe, and look to add matching patterns to your wallpaper and scatter cushions.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout) Moonstone - Roller Blind
products.description: Moonstone from their anthology (blackout) range allows you to introduce a blend of white, beige, and grey to your colour scheme with the click of a button. Its intricate weave and clever patched style of colouring provides a depth and subtlety to proceedings that you perhaps weren't expecting. Take your decor down the contemporary meets country route by adding in some stencil signs on the walls, shabby chic furniture, and a little cracked leather for good measure.
